name: Educore
goal: Advising government organisations, and consortia consisting of government, business, universities and NGOs, in projects about innovation, organizational development, and learning, with a special emphasis on hands-on problem solving in complex social, societal and administrative situations. This work focusses on systemic innovation in the field of public policy-making, sustainable development in civil service organisations, and the development of instruments and methodologies for societal innovation such as action-learning camps for societal innovation and future centers.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020, Interreg Europe, Interreg Baltic Sea Region, Committee of the Regions, Joint Research Centre, DG Connect
